citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are some free or freemium AI transcription tools you can use to convert speech to text: Widely used / general-purpose Otter.ai – real-time and uploaded audio transcription with speaker labels (free tier available). Tech.co+1
TurboScribe – browser-based tool powered by Whisper, supporting 100+ languages and quick file uploads. TurboScribe
Deepgram (free tool) – free online speech-to-text for audio and YouTube links, quick transcript generation. Deepgram

sources.title: Best Free AI Transcription Tools - tactiq.io
sources.snippet: Discover the top free AI transcription tools to transcribe audio. Learn how these tools handle audio and video files, offering accurate transcripts.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Restream (free transcription) – simple audio/video file transcription for creators. Tactiq
Real-time / meeting focused Tactiq – captures transcripts from Zoom/Teams/Meet in browser; free tier available. Tactiq

sources.title: Transcribe audio with Google Gemini for free - here's how to do it
sources.snippet: Google Gemini now offers a free tool for transcribing audio files up to 10 minutes long. Users can upload up to 10 audio files at once, provided their combined length doesn't exceed the time limit. Compatible formats include MP3, AAC, and WAV. To begin, users can access Gemini via its website or app, select the upload option, and choose their desired audio file. Once uploaded, a prompt like "transcribe this speech" initiates the process. If an error occurs, retrying usually resolves the issue. Transcriptions are generated quickly, though they may include filler words (e.g., "uhms" and "ahs"). Users can instruct Gemini to clean the transcript by prompting it to remove such filler words. Additionally, Gemini can help summarize the audio or extract key points, making it a versatile tool for various transcription needs.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Google Gemini (free feature) – lets you upload short audio clips for basic transcription. Tom's Guide
Alternate free options Google Voice Typing (in Google Docs) – free speech-to-text dictation in browser. Maestra AI
Live Transcribe (Android) – accessibility-focused live transcription. Maestra AI
Voice Crafters free tool – free browser AI transcription up to ~30 min. voicecrafters.com
